businessProfile.name: Drew's on Halsted
businessProfile.address: 3201 N Halsted St, Chicago, IL 60657, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 3201 N Halsted St, Chicago, IL 60657, USA

reviews.text:
If you‚Äôre looking for a brunch that sparkles with joy, sass, and unforgettable flavor, look no further than Drew‚Äôs on Halsted. Nestled in the heart of Boystown, Drew‚Äôs is more than a restaurant‚Äîit‚Äôs a full-on weekend experience, especially during their drag brunch extravaganza.
I visited on a lively Sunday afternoon, and from the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was electric.

A bright and spacious spot for classic American fare. We visited for brunch during the holiday season and appreciated the festive Christmas decor that created a cozy atmosphere. The smoked salmon pizza was refreshing and flavorful while the NY Strip Steak Melt was a standout, featuring tender rare steak atop cheesy buns and paired with delicious truffle fries. Truly comfort food done right, and we‚Äôre excited to return to explore their dinner offerings.

Ordered medium filet. First one was  well done like overcooked.  Told them and look what was second filet looks like. It's not even medium rare. It was rare but literally raw inside.
Ordered medium well burger but it was overcooked too...
I used to work in steak place and know how medium steak looks like. I bet that chef had no idea how to cook steak. If you have no idea how to cook steak at least use meat thermometer pls. It's not worth like 48$ steak at all.
Skewer was good and it was medium. üëç
Service was good.
If you wanna dine in here believe me do not order steak. üòâ

Found Drew‚Äôs on TikTok, and so thankful we did.
Their lovely host Blanca greeted us and watched the once in a lifetime dust storm roll into Chicago.
Our server Cesar was amazing, so kind and professional. His timing was on point. The back waiters/food runners/support staff also crushed it.
Cocktails were perfect, carnation pink cosmopolitan, and the filthy martini.
Had the Charcuterie, special salad w grilled peaches, entrees on pan seared scallops that were perfect seared, and an incredible duck confit.
And honestly, the owner being there, doing table touches and chatting folks up was icing on the cake.
It was an incredible dinner that will be remembered.

Random pick for brunch in the neighborhood we were staying in - great find! Service is polite without being intrusive. Food is amazing. The roasted salmon BLT is a downright inspired menu choice - though I did have a little breakfast envy looking at my daughter's chilaquiles. Tasted as good as it looked. Happy we found this place! If we'd had more time, we might have taken advantage of their bottomless mimosas.

editorial_summary.overview: Cozy, laid-back mainstay featuring American bistro fare with global accents plus a full bar & patio.

recentReviews.text: This is an excellent restaurant. The food is delicious. I have had the veggie burger and the quinoa salad. The bread pudding is exceptional. Very attentive and friendly staff. Beautiful ambiance. The outdoor patio is cozy and nice on a summer day. The indoors is tastefully decorated. Lively and fun on the weekends and quiet and mellow on the weekdays.
The best place. Drew is wonderful and Cara is the best bartender and a delight.

A favorite brunch place for my spouse and I.
Fun and upbeat!
Great service from multiple staff members. I thought my steak was tasty and a good value!
During a giant rush for a pop-up Cabaret event, Raf remained calm, congenial and competent at his job. He offered excellent service, with warmth.

I went for diner to this place and I left half of my dinner to share with my hubby at home and when I got home there was only a little portion of my left overs. Never again to return to this place and I will share my experience in all social media!

detailedReviews.author: Ana Gil
detailedReviews.text: This is an excellent restaurant. The food is delicious. I have had the veggie burger and the quinoa salad. The bread pudding is exceptional. Very attentive and friendly staff. Beautiful ambiance. The outdoor patio is cozy and nice on a summer day. The indoors is tastefully decorated. Lively and fun on the weekends and quiet and mellow on the weekdays.

detailedReviews.author: AMY VIE
detailedReviews.text: The best place. Drew is wonderful and Cara is the best bartender and a delight.

detailedReviews.author: Teresa Alting
detailedReviews.text:
A favorite brunch place for my spouse and I.
Fun and upbeat!

detailedReviews.author: Ari Barjesteh
detailedReviews.text: Great service from multiple staff members. I thought my steak was tasty and a good value!

detailedReviews.author: Lyubov Apparatchik
detailedReviews.text: During a giant rush for a pop-up Cabaret event, Raf remained calm, congenial and competent at his job. He offered excellent service, with warmth.

detailedReviews.author: Claudia Flores-Regalado
detailedReviews.text: I went for diner to this place and I left half of my dinner to share with my hubby at home and when I got home there was only a little portion of my left overs. Never again to return to this place and I will share my experience in all social media!

detailedReviews.author: Edward Gurick
detailedReviews.text: Great burgers! Cold beer.what more can you ask from a corner bar.

detailedReviews.author: Edward Edward
detailedReviews.text: Casual Fine Dining done VERY well! Broad choices, daily chef features, magical cocktail creations! Very friendly staff! Heard about Drews from several local restaurant staff all high recommendations. Fresh fish, duck confite & pork chop in a blueberry sauce were our choices. Each of us had 2 drinks shared an appetizer for $100 each. ‚ù§Ô∏è DREWS!

detailedReviews.author: David Marcelo Seminario Calle
detailedReviews.text:
Really nice stuff
Cool space

detailedReviews.author: Amy Blue
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food, great ambience! Luis, Rob and Isaac were so personable and accommodating ü•∞

detailedReviews.author: Brad Kincaid
detailedReviews.text: Not only was our server, Rafa, amazing and the most friendly person, but we also met the Drew of Drew's. Everyone here is amazing and I would highly recommend coming here.

detailedReviews.author: Arthur Naruszewicz
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food, super drinks. Shout out to Robbie for awesome service! Happy Pride üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà

detailedReviews.author: matthew katz
detailedReviews.text: Went for lunch and it was slow but a nice spot to grab a meal. We had a few cocktails which were good. Had the salmon BLT and a burger, everything was cooked properly and service was great.

detailedReviews.author: Kaleigh Walters
detailedReviews.text: Anything negative you hear about this restaurant is almost guaranteed to be true. The food is good, but not memorable. The employees, management, owners and atmosphere is so off putting you‚Äôll lose your appetite for the food anyway.

detailedReviews.author: Garret S
detailedReviews.text: Great risotto

detailedReviews.author: Kami B
detailedReviews.text:
If you‚Äôre looking for a brunch that sparkles with joy, sass, and unforgettable flavor, look no further than Drew‚Äôs on Halsted. Nestled in the heart of Boystown, Drew‚Äôs is more than a restaurant‚Äîit‚Äôs a full-on weekend experience, especially during their drag brunch extravaganza.
I visited on a lively Sunday afternoon, and from the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was electric.

detailedReviews.author: Ram√≥n Ram√≠rez
detailedReviews.text: Visitamos este lugar dos veces, durante nuestra estancia en Chicago y en ambas ocasiones, la atenci√≥n y el servicio por parte del personal fue excelente. Nuestro agradecimiento especial a C√©sar, por su excelente trato y sus recomendaciones para comidas y bebidas

detailedReviews.author: C.G. Ware
detailedReviews.text: Great experience,  great food

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Chaisson
detailedReviews.text:
Found Drew‚Äôs on TikTok, and so thankful we did.
Their lovely host Blanca greeted us and watched the once in a lifetime dust storm roll into Chicago.
Our server Cesar was amazing, so kind and professional. His timing was on point. The back waiters/food runners/support staff also crushed it.
Cocktails were perfect, carnation pink cosmopolitan, and the filthy martini.
Had the Charcuterie, special salad w grilled peaches, entrees on pan seared scallops that were perfect seared, and an incredible duck confit.
And honestly, the owner being there, doing table touches and chatting folks up was icing on the cake.
It was an incredible dinner that will be remembered.

detailedReviews.author: Derek Hoffman
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I stopped in and were personally seated by Drew himself. The entire staff were friendly and amazing and made great recommendations. We had the scallops and the medallions and both were delicious. We‚Äôll definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Nancy Nekola
detailedReviews.text: Great service and delicious food and drinks.

detailedReviews.author: Windy ‚ÄúbWix‚Äù
detailedReviews.text:
Ordered medium filet. First one was  well done like overcooked.  Told them and look what was second filet looks like. It's not even medium rare. It was rare but literally raw inside.
Ordered medium well burger but it was overcooked too...
I used to work in steak place and know how medium steak looks like. I bet that chef had no idea how to cook steak. If you have no idea how to cook steak at least use meat thermometer pls. It's not worth like 48$ steak at all.
Skewer was good and it was medium. üëç
Service was good.
If you wanna dine in here believe me do not order steak. üòâ

detailedReviews.author: Korie Parr
detailedReviews.text: This place is the best! Constantly delicious food. üíú

detailedReviews.author: Kent Hiller
detailedReviews.text: The food and fun was bottomless as was the champagne. We had a great time!! Would definitely come back

detailedReviews.author: Deborah Geib
detailedReviews.text:
We saw Miss Foosie on her birthday! It was so much fun! The staff was wonderful and welcomed us! The food was fabulous! It was a terrific time with flowing mimosas! The best was that Miss Foosie was there
And performed a couple numbers for us!
She really made it a joyous atmosphere! She's there every first Sunday and we will be sure to come back

detailedReviews.author: Travis Hampton
detailedReviews.text: Great location to start out the day. Enjoyed the service and hospitality

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Carrillo
detailedReviews.text: Great food! Lively atmosphere! Great service!

detailedReviews.author: O B
detailedReviews.text: Love this place.  They  have an option of coliflower crust pizza  for my keto diet. Cocktails are amazing and they have this amazing happy hour that make you forget all your problems. Best server Rafa and the friendly crew (Cara, Jorge and Isaac ) cool ambience and cool manager ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Work in the industry, always appreciate a great customer service üëç

detailedReviews.author: Kyle Hillebrand
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I make it a point to come here each time we‚Äôre in town. The food never misses, the staff are always so friendly, and the service is quick but not overbearing. Solid 10/10 every time

detailedReviews.author: mykola melnyk
detailedReviews.text: Okay

detailedReviews.author: Elliot Kyriakoplos
detailedReviews.text: Wow this place has great food and the friendliest - professional staff in the area. Went for my wife‚Äôs birthday with her sister and bf along with her parents and some aunties. Drinks are great and service is top notch. Had the sea bass special and the shrimp sauce on top was like a little bit of heaven. Bring a date or family, they will like it

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Fisher
detailedReviews.text: Our server was FANTASTIC!

detailedReviews.author: Meghan Gillotte
detailedReviews.text: If you're thinking ohhh idk should I get the salmon club just get it cause wow

detailedReviews.author: Ray Ng
detailedReviews.text: Always love stopping by this place when we are in the boystown area. Love the service and atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Giuseppe D'Alessandro
detailedReviews.text: Great neiboorhood place!

detailedReviews.author: Nicole S
detailedReviews.text: Food and drinks were fabulous. Had a great server. Portions excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Richie
detailedReviews.text: Visiting Chicago for the first time and it‚Äôs freezing out!!! Drew‚Äôs was a perfect dinner tonight (Monday) and worth the final cost! Everything we order arrived within 20 minutes and it was excellent. Meals were hot‚Äî burger cooked to med-rare perfection, crispy bacon, fantastic truffle fries, and really tasty chicken quesadillas. Dessert was great too‚Äî especially Key Lime Pie and yummy ice cream. It‚Äôs classic American food, but with a high quality elevated flair.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Niednagel
detailedReviews.text: Average brunch food in a lively, loud, crowded environment. Food was good but nothing spectacular.

detailedReviews.author: Andrea C
detailedReviews.text: What stood out, besides the delicious food and drinks, was how happy all the employees were. Such a friendly atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Valencia
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza and drinks are great!
I reserved a table for a party of 8 ahead of time and ordered 2 pizzas. My sister and I were the first to arrive on time so we took a seat and ordered drinks. A rude waitress kept bugging us asking if we really needed 8 seats, I told her yes and she kept bugging us about the seats for the next 10 minutes, it was so annoying we just decided to cancel it and go somewhere else with our group, really bad service, great pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Susan Eichler
detailedReviews.text: Rob is Fab

detailedReviews.author: Christine Yu
detailedReviews.text: First time dining here last night and I loved it!  A+ all around. Our server Isaac and everyone else working on 1/27 did an amazing job. I was looking for delicious comfort food because it's the dead of winter and Drew's delivered. I left full and happy. I am already planning my next visit!

detailedReviews.author: Kyle Urbashich
detailedReviews.text: Drew‚Äôs is one of the last good brunch spots in the Boystown area. It‚Äôs always lively during lunch and the menu options for entrees have a lot to choose from. As for the drink selection, I‚Äôve enjoyed the variety of juices with the mimosas. I‚Äôve also had the Bloody Mary, which is fine. The only down fall is that sometimes the music that the DJ is playing can be loud. While I like the touch the music gives, maybe just a notch lower.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Brown
detailedReviews.text:
Visited on NYE, which was insanely busy/overbooked. We had a 7:30 reservation and were seated at 8:10. (We had tickets to a show, so this left us rushed.) The host was working really hard! We were a little disappointed that we could only order from the holiday menu (we wanted the bacon-wrapped dates from the regular menu, but they weren't available.) We told our server that we had a time crunch, so he helped insure that our app & entree orders went in together. The staff did an amazing job of getting our drinks, app and entrees to us very quickly, so we had more time to enjoy everything.
All the food was delicious (lemon chicken, striped bass with crab risotto, and bowtie pasta.) Our group would like to go back on a non-holiday night.

detailedReviews.author: Bill Wang
detailedReviews.text: A bright and spacious spot for classic American fare. We visited for brunch during the holiday season and appreciated the festive Christmas decor that created a cozy atmosphere. The smoked salmon pizza was refreshing and flavorful while the NY Strip Steak Melt was a standout, featuring tender rare steak atop cheesy buns and paired with delicious truffle fries. Truly comfort food done right, and we‚Äôre excited to return to explore their dinner offerings.

detailedReviews.author: Ethan Call
detailedReviews.text: Great food and great service! Not cheap but worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Graham Pridgen
detailedReviews.text: The food was amazing. Rob was even better. Give that man a raise.

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Michael
detailedReviews.text: I enjoyed the food, and the service was excellent! Will return.

detailedReviews.author: Ashlee Waters
detailedReviews.text: We had been wanting to try this place for a while so we decided to go for my birthday. The manager was extremely rude and on a power trip to the point that the server apologized for him / on his behalf. We won‚Äôt be back which is unfortunate. Also, as mentioned above this all happened during a birthday celebration ‚Ä¶ super weird. I don‚Äôt get being mean‚Ä¶ to your customers..

detailedReviews.author: Manolo Perrotta
detailedReviews.text:
Outstanding Dining Experience

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Drew, and it was an experience to remember. From the moment I walked in, the warm and inviting atmosphere set the tone for the evening. The staff were incredibly attentive, knowledgeable, and made sure every detail was perfect.

The menu offered a fantastic selection of dishes, and everything I tried was bursting with flavor.

Overall, Drew exceeded my expectations. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a special night out or simply great food in a lovely setting, this place is a must-visit. I can‚Äôt wait to return!

detailedReviews.author: Ed Antoni
detailedReviews.text: Kara id a phenomenal bar tender and Drew's is always üëå good.

detailedReviews.author: Simone Morris
detailedReviews.text: Enjoyed a window seat while the parade was getting set up, food was average, I had to send the steak back to be cooked more, they were very gracious about everything.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Ritchie
detailedReviews.text: A lovely setting with good food and good service. I would go back.

detailedReviews.author: G Fost
detailedReviews.text: The food is good, but extremely small portions for what seems like fair prices. A happy hour ravioli was only $8, but there were only three 1‚Äùx1‚Äù raviolis. The atmosphere is cliquy and if you don‚Äôt clique it can be very cold and uninviting.  Drew will come across as nice, but it is his job I suppose. I would say the place is biased and only in support of the immigrant and LGBT community. Too bad they can‚Äôt truly be accepting.

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Blattner
detailedReviews.text: Great food and atmosphere. Our Waiter was really good and I don‚Äôt think we ever had less than a half glass of water.  Perfect place to go before a Blue Man show!

detailedReviews.author: Cherie Williams
detailedReviews.text: Friends & I visited the City last week from WI. We chose to sit on the patio to soak up the nice weather while we still could. Inside the restaurant looked elegant, but I definitely didn't feel any hoity-toity vibes at all. Our server, Ryan, was exceptionally kind and welcoming. He was attentive, but didn't hover, which was nice. The food here is SUPERB. All of us ordered something different: burger; scallops; steak; and a veggie quinoa bowl with added salmon. Everything was truly delicious. The mushroom risotto made you want to lick the plate. Given the chance, I wouldn't hesitate to return again. Bravo!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Rodgers
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful service, Rafa went above and beyond to discuss the menu! And don't get me started on the food. The calamari was phenomenal. I also recommend the unbelievably crispy "blueberry porkchop", if your looking for a truly unique and delish dish. "Drew's Manhattan" has a wealth of depth and flavor!

detailedReviews.author: Emily Hecht
detailedReviews.text: Drew's has a beautiful ambiance with cozy lighting  and decor. The staff is friendly and attentive. The menu is varied and delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Laura
detailedReviews.text: Ordered Uber eats a veggie omelet with roasted potatoes. As I was waiting for my food I decided to look at the reviews -which I clearly should have done before hand- any ways it made me nervous that my order was going to come messed up and sure enough.. I received a greasy meat omelet with French fries‚Ä¶.. some people do not eat fried foods or can‚Äôt cause they have stomach issues. If you are out of something let someone know don‚Äôt just give them what ever you feel like in your convenience.

detailedReviews.author: Scotty Ginett
detailedReviews.text: Brunch or dinner, you won‚Äôt be disappointed at Drew‚Äôs! Great menu, lively atmosphere, and superb service. Reservation is recommended.

detailedReviews.author: Paul Owen
detailedReviews.text: Great service. Our server, Rob, was fantastic and kept us laughing.  The food was delicious, and so were the varieties of mimosas.  We sat on the back patio, and it was very nice.  We will be back soon

detailedReviews.author: Nick Christopher
detailedReviews.text: Excellent place all around. Came in on a random Thursday night for dinner, and although we were disappointed the outdoor patio was closed, the food and service more than made up for it. The food - delicious - and the service, as another reviewer noted, polite, but not intrusive. Just the right balance. Price point was perfect. We got a great dinner for the money. We will absolutely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Marilyn Dollar
detailedReviews.text: Great drinks, chicken club & truffle fries!

detailedReviews.author: Marty Howard
detailedReviews.text:
Great little restaurant recommended by our hotel staff. Asked what is your favorite restaurant in the area.
He was right it was excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Jena Difiore
detailedReviews.text: Food is great, good brunch deals, service is wonderful. Robbie is the best! Robbie makes the experience so fun

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the exceptional and diverse food offerings, such as the veggie burger, quinoa salad, and magical cocktail creations. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant's ambiance, including the cozy outdoor patio and tastefully decorated indoors, is highly appreciated by patrons. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The attentive and friendly staff, including standout employees like Drew, Cara, and Rafa, enhance the dining experience significantly. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to poor service and management behavior - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness, particularly with complaints about loud music and an unwelcoming environment - social media marketing can improve this area
Long wait times and reservation issues, especially during busy periods like NYE - Boostly marketing services can improve this

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
